install.name: GetResposne Webform Integration
install.author: Implix
install.description: This module makes it easy to integrate custom web forms created in GetResponse into Joomla!-based websites. Add any custom fields for more effective segmentation of your list and they will automatically appear on your Joomla! site sign up form.

param.name: webform_id
param.label: WebForm ID
param.description: Write id of webform created in GetResponse.com

param.name: display_css
param.label: Display Styles
param.description: Use GetRespone styles or use default Joomla's style.
